channel.title: I2C on LuyangのBlog
channel.description: Recent content in I2C on LuyangのBlog

item.title: I2C command
item.description: I2C 寄存器读写命令 探测设备 i2cdetect HELLO@WORLD:~# i2cdetect Error: No i2c-bus specified! Usage: i2cdetect [-y] [-a] [-q|-r] I2CBUS [FIRST LAST] i2cdetect -F I2CBUS i2cdetect -l I2CBUS is an integer or an I2C bus name If provided, FIRST and LAST limit the probing range. # I2CBUS: 0 1 2 ... # Notice: -r 参数很重要，不带 -r 参数
